titleinfo.title: Indians for Indians Radio Show, October 21, 1947

mods.note: Comanche Group, Yellow Mission, Lawton, Oklahoma
mods.tableOfContents: Fred Ticeahkie - In Comanche (2). Fred Ticeahkie - Comanche Hymn. Lee Motah and others - Ft. Sill Apache Hymn Tune (Comanche version). Group - Comanche Hymns (6).
mods.note: When citing recordings from this collection, please using the following: Indians for Indians Radio Show. Western History Collections, University of Oklahoma Libraries.
